data.meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.
data.sentence: The word يَرْجِعُونَ comes from the root ر ج ع and is associated with the meanings: to return, turn back, turn off, (blame) upon any one, come back, repeat, answer, bring answer, be brought back. raji'un - one who returns. murji'un - return, termination. taraja'a (vb. 6)  -to return to one another.

data.meanings: he separated/divided or put apart a thing from another thing, made a separation/partition, distinct/plain/clear/manifest, explain in detail, to distinguish, deciding between two things (e.g. what is true and what is not), distinct portion/section.FASALA: To set apart, separate, distinguish, set a limit, part, depart, decide, set out, divide into parts, expatiate into detail, make clear (statement), distinct, judge, narrate a thing with all its particulars. FASLUN: Distinguishing, DecisiveMUFASSALAN: Clearly explainedFUSSILAT: DetailedMUFASSALAT: Fully detailed
data.sentence: The word نُفَصِّلُ comes from the root ف ص ل and is associated with the meanings: he separated/divided or put apart a thing from another thing, made a separation/partition, distinct/plain/clear/manifest, explain in detail, to distinguish, deciding between two things (e.g. what is true and what is not), distinct portion/section.FASALA: To set apart, separate, distinguish, set a limit, part, depart, decide, set out, divide into parts, expatiate into detail, make clear (statement), distinct, judge, narrate a thing with all its particulars. FASLUN: Distinguishing, DecisiveMUFASSALAN: Clearly explainedFUSSILAT: DetailedMUFASSALAT: Fully detailed
